data.actual_result: You can hear sounds on PC when users connects to voice channel
data.expected_result: You will not hear sound when user connects to voice channel on PC
data.short_description: Changing voice channel from PC to Mobiles causes coneection sounds on PC
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to voice Channel on PC - On mobiles connect to same channel - When on PC you will get kicked from voice channel, let your friend enter voice channel
